scripts.program-edit-list: node dist/index.js --exercise-start 01022018 --metadata ./metadata.json --edit --edit-short --list-csv 'depenses: data/depenses.csv, depensesPieces:  data/depenses-pieces.csv, saisiePieces: data/saisie-pieces.csv, balanceReouverture: data/balance-reouverture.csv, planComptable: data/plan-comptable.csv, journaux: data/journaux.csv' --output-dir Output
